posts.name: Tamasha
posts.about: Tamasha is one of the most popular places to hang out in Heart of Delhi-CP. This Restaurant has Distinct Seating Areas including a Courtyard, Ground Floor, First Floor, Backyard and an Amazing Rooftop over spacious ambience. Tamasha offers multi-cuisine dishes from North Indian, Italian, Continental and Asian cuisines and an array of Finger Food. Tamasha is an ideal place for a Night Out Friends or good times with Family Members. The eye-catching bar is built to resemble Optimus Prime, a fictional character from the Transformers Franchise. This is a super awesome place which is definitely worth going for one and all!

reviews.name: Antriksh
reviews.head: Could be better: Ambience
reviews.reviewPost: no sanitizers were there on tables.. washroom is also bit unhygienic

posts.name: The G.T. ROAD
posts.about: Local, situated in the heart of the capital, is a colossal beauty for all party lovers. It is the epitome of class and elegance, with interiors adorned by paintings of monuments in Delhi, the space is just beautiful. Serving some of the best North Indian and Continental dishes from its affordable menu, Local makes it a worthwhile visit for one and all. The exclusive bar menu also offers an array of drinks and fine spirits to choose from. Be it getting into the party zone or spending some good time with your friends or unwinding with your colleagues, Local is where you can head to for some unadulterated happiness! The additional feature is the DJ nights hosted there which makes everyone groove on the dance floor. Local is located in Scindia House in Connaught Place, Delhi.

reviews.name: Aarjav Jain
reviews.head: Disliked: Food
reviews.reviewPost: I think they should also focus on their menu. there is no variety of food and drinks.

posts.name: Boa Village
posts.about: Bao Village is situated in the posh locality of Civil Lines, where you can tantalize your senses with the aroma of Chinese, Japanese, Asian, and Korean Cuisines. The place has a beautiful outdoor seating space and a dining area. The high-end liquor, smoothies, and cocktails paired up with Live Music and Match Screening take you to a joyful journey like never before. The nearest landmark of Bao Village is Civil Lines Metro Station Gate No.3.

reviews.name: Rakhi Khattar
reviews.head: Disliked: Food
reviews.reviewPost: I think they should also focus on their menu. there is no variety of food and drinks.

posts.name: October
posts.about: October is a perfect getaway from the mundane flow of life, bringing alive the very essence of the pub culture made famous by the typical pubs of Europe, offering a place to connect with friends, conversations, awesome food and drinks, in an ambiance that lets you relax and go with the flow. This brand new urban spin of pub culture arrives at the capital. Take a trip to The Chatter House, a welcome ambiance that immediately transports you to another level. The outlet is located in Khan Market, Delhi.
